title: Supernatural’s Jared Padalecki ‘arrested for assault’ in bar brawl
text:
Jared was reportedly arrested in Austin on Sunday (Picture: Getty Images)

Supernatural star Jared Padalecki was reportedly arrested over the weekend in connection to an altercation at a bar in Austin, Texas.

The 37-year-old actor, who plays Sam Winchester in the hit CW show, was reportedly taken into police custody on suspicion of assault and public intoxication at Stereotype bar in Austin, in the early hours of Sunday morning.

According to TMZ, eyewitnesses said Jared allegedly struck a bartender in the face inside the bar, as well as the establishment’s general manager, whom he’s also reported to have struck.

This prompted a friend to take him outside in an attempt to calm him down but footage obtained by the publication shows the two men tussling on the pavement. The friend put Jared in a headlock before the actor backed away with his hands in the air.

Police officers eventually arrived on the scene and, at one point, Jared is seen leaning back on the bonnet of a police car.

After allegedly flashing wads of cash at the officers shortly after they arrived, Jared was eventually restrained and taken away.

The booking sheet reportedly shows that Jared was arrested on two counts of assault and one count of public intoxication.

Jared was seen tussling with another man outside the bar (Picture: Backgrid)

Police intervened after this altercation on the pavement (Picture: Backgrid)

Jared is believed to be a regular at the Stereotype bar but some reports say he is an investor, while local reports describe him as the owner. The bar opened in September 2018 and the actor attended the grand opening.

The TV star’s bond is reportedly set at $5,000 (£3,900) per charge totalling $15,000 (£11,600), but it’s not yet known if he’s been bailed out of jail.

Jared is best known for starring as Sam Winchester in Supernatural and his character was arrested in the 2007 episode, Folsom Prison Blues, during the show’s second series.

The actor is married to Genevieve Cortese and they share three children – Thomas, seven, Austin, five and Odette, two.

Metro.co.uk has contacted Jared Padalecki’s reps and the Austin Police Department for comment.
